from fastapi import FastAPI, HTTPException
from pydantic import BaseModel

app = FastAPI()

class Item(BaseModel):
    name: str
    description: str
    price: float

def create_item(item: Item):
    # Your data pipeline logic here

@app.post('/items/')
async def create_item_endpoint(item: Item):
